name: ALGAE BIOMASS ORGANIZATION
sampleDescriptions: H.R. 3266, S. 1609 (became Division D of H.R. 1625 - Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018)  FY2018 Energy and Water Appropriations: algae appropriations and carbon capture and utilization.
S. 2256 - Tax Extender Act of 2017;  To extend and expand the Internal Revenue Code section 45Q tax credit for carbon dioxide sequestration (became Section 41119 of H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act).
Yet to be introduced Farm Bill, provision related to energy and biofuels.
H.R. 2: Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018:  bio-energy and algae provisions.
H.R. 5895, S. 2975: Energy and Water, Legislative Branch, and Military Construction and Veterans Affairs Appropriations Act, 2019: algae appropriations and carbon capture and utilization.
